description:
"American Horror Story: Coven" creator Ryan Murphy has dished a few tidbits to EW about next season. 《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》制片人Ryan Murphy向《娱乐周刊》透露了关于《美国恐怖故事》第四季的一些消息。

He confirms it will not be contemporary and adds, "It's either going to shoot in New Orleans or it's going to shoot in Santa Fe."他表示，《美国恐怖故事》第四季将会是和第三季完全不同的时期里的故事，“新的一季会在新奥尔良或者是圣达菲两个城市中选择一个来拍摄。”

We wonder if that means they haven't decided on the exact focus yet, since New Orleans and Santa Fe have two very different vibes to them. But perhaps not -- settings can certainly be made to look any number of ways.由于新奥尔良和圣达菲是两个历史文化背景完全不同的两个城市，因此我们怀疑美恐剧组可能还没有最后确定第四季的主题。不过也不一定，剧集的背景设定可以变化的因素很多。

One thing you won't be seeing next year is an "AHS: Coven" spinoff. Murphy confirms that that project is not happening.Murphy表示，《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》明年不会出衍生剧。

"We were starting to break episode 8 or 9 and we were like, 'Well, we can't kill that person off because we need them for the spin-off,'" says Murphy. "As soon as those words were said, I was like, 'There is no spin-off.' Because it took away from the joy of the show. The reason the show is successful is no one is safe ever."“我们在编第八、九集的时候就在犹豫‘我们不能把这个角色杀掉，这个角色我们衍生剧里肯定需要她，”Murphy说。“不过很快我们就决定，不能为了衍生剧削弱这部剧的精彩性，因此我们决定不出衍生剧。这部剧之所以这么好看就是因为剧中没有任何一个角色是安全的。

"American Horror Story: Coven" airs Wednesday nights at 10 p.m. ET/PT on FX.《美国恐怖故事：女巫集会》每周三10点在FX电视台播出。
